scripts.read-all-readmes: npm run read-library-readmes && npm run read-app-readmes
scripts.read-library-readmes:
find libraries -name 'README.md' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -print0 | xargs -0 -I {} bash -c 'echo "
===== {} =====
"; cat "{}"; echo "
--------------------
"'
scripts.read-app-readmes:
find apps -name 'README.md' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -print0 | xargs -0 -I {} bash -c 'echo "
===== {} =====
"; cat "{}"; echo "
--------------------
"'
